description: This is a market on predicting the statements made by Trump during his Pennsylvania town hall.

markets.description:
Donald Trump has scheduled a town hall on October 20 in Lancaster, Pennsylvania (see: https://event.donaldjtrump.com/events/president-donald-j-trump-to-host-a-town-hall-in-lancaster-pennsylvania).

This market will resolve to "Yes" if Trump says "60 Minutes" during their appearance at this event. Otherwise, the market will resolve to "No".

Any usage of the term regardless of context will count toward the resolution of this market.

Pluralization/possessive of the term will count toward the resolution of this market, however other forms will NOT count.

If this candidate does not appear at this event, or if the event is otherwise cancelled or delayed beyond October 20, this market will resolve to "No".

The resolution source will be the video of the event.
markets.question: Will Trump say "60 Minutes" during Pennsylvania town hall on October 20?

markets.description:
Donald Trump has scheduled a town hall on October 20 in Lancaster, Pennsylvania (see: https://event.donaldjtrump.com/events/president-donald-j-trump-to-host-a-town-hall-in-lancaster-pennsylvania).
